did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: ILR School Ad Hoc Committee on Off-Campus Credit Programs Report, 1979
did.origination:
New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR);
Committee on Off-Campus Credit Programs
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: ILS School Interim Report of the Ad Hoc Committee on Off-Campus Credit Programs, 1979.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of an interim report from the Ad Hoc Committee on Off-Campus Credit Committees, for discussion at a March 9, 1970, ILR Faculty Meeting.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
